name: Second Life Shadow
description:
Fight different monsters and talk with the shadow people in order to find a way off the island. Upon taking lethal damage you enter a shadow state where you can get to an alter to turn back and get another chance. You can also stay in the shadow state to utilize it's improved power. There is an ending to the game.

DON'T PLAY ON FULLSCREEN: By clicking the unity fullscreen button, it shows parts of the map that you are not supposed to see.

Controls:

W,A,S,D or Arrows to move.

E to Interact.

Left click to attack and Right click to dash in the direction you move.

You can walk away in order to leave the shop.
